articles.author: Jennifer Rigby, Julie Steenhuysen
articles.title: Rich nations have millions of mpox shots: Will they share with Africa? - Reuters.com
articles.description: Donated shots are falling far short of what African countries need.
articles.content: Sept 12 (Reuters) - Rich countries have several hundred million doses of vaccines that could help fight an mpox outbreak in Africa, where donated shots fall far short of what is needed, according to … [+6433 chars]
